snippet: Shaun Murphy of England, the defending champion, lost his opening match at the Masters, falling to Mark Allen of Northern Ireland, 6-4, at Alexandra Palace in London.
abstract: Mark Allen defeats defending champion Shaun Murphy in quarterfinals of 2016 Masters Snooker.
lead_paragraph: Shaun Murphy of England, the defending champion, lost his opening match at the Masters, falling to Mark Allen of Northern Ireland, 6-4, at Alexandra Palace in London.
